sentences.sContent: He had swallowed so much sea water he wanted to vomit.
sentences.sCn: 他呛了这么多海水，所以想吐。

sentences.sContent: I knew I was really in trouble when I began vomiting blood.
sentences.sCn: 我开始吐血的时候才知道我的麻烦大了。

remMethod.val: v + o(形似嘴) + mit(词根mit指“发送”) → 张嘴发送 → 呕吐

trans.tranCn: 呕吐， 恶心； 喷出
trans.tranOther: to bring food or drink up from your stomach out through your mouth, because you are ill
food or other substances that come up from your stomach and through your mouth when you vomit
